definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
bassoon/also written 巴頌管|巴颂管 or 巴松管

sentences.english: Basso continuo will be played here by the guitar.
sentences.chinese: 在本場演出裏，則將由吉他來演奏通奏低音。

sentences.english: The unusually big suspension allows the woofer to perform big membrane movements.
sentences.chinese: 這種罕有的大懸浮設計使低音能夠執行大膜移動。

sentences.english: In China, more and more people are concerned about learning and double bass .
sentences.chinese: 在我國，越來越多的人學習和關注低音提琴。

sentences.english: Paul Chambers was on the bass, and James Cobb played drums.
sentences.chinese: 保羅錢伯斯是在低音，和詹姆斯科布敲鼓。

sentences.english: The noise occultation was significant, and the undertone was the easiest one to be occulted.
sentences.chinese: 噪音對信號的掩蔽作用顯著，其中低音最易被掩蔽。

sentences.english: Soprano, alto, tenor and bass constitute the four vocal parts.
sentences.chinese: 這是男高音和女低音的組合。

sentences.english: The boy sings bass in the choir.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩在合唱團裏唱男低音。

sentences.english: A： I always turn the mega bass on when I listen to rock.
sentences.chinese: 我聽搖滾樂時總是喜歡打開超重低音。

sentences.english: It is simply better at re-creating a bass line.
sentences.chinese: 這只不過是更好地重新創建一個低音線。

sentences.english: And try to sing the bass.
Bass is deep and tight, not bright yet very clear sound.
sentences.chinese: 下潛而有力的低音，不會過亮卻格外清晰的聲音。

sentences.english: The songs were arranged by another well-known bass player.
sentences.chinese: 這些曲子後經另一名著名男低音歌手改編。

sentences.english: Naturally measurements are only one part of the subwoofer evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 實事求是的說，測量參數也只是低音炮評估的一部分。

sentences.english: I play bass-guitar too, but mainly use the double bass when I play jazz.
sentences.chinese: 我彈爵士樂時主要用的就是那把低音提琴。

definition: sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
natural voice/modal voice/true voice/opposite: falsetto 假聲|假声[jia3 sheng1]
